message.title: Welcome to Mozilla VPN 2.10
message.subtitle: You’re using the latest version of Mozilla VPN. Take a look at the newest features and updates available in Mozilla VPN 2.10:

content.content: New message center, where you can learn about important updates (like this one!)
New tips and tricks to help you use the app’s features and settings
The speed test feature now also tests upload speeds in addition to download speeds
Other bug fixes and UI adjustments
Improved icons in the Windows and macOS tray to help you quickly assess your connection

blocks.content: We’re always working to improve Mozilla VPN; thanks for updating to the latest version!
